template.description: This template was demoed at HealTac 2023
template.name: HealTAC_23

labels.label: I. Get the records we ingested previously from the JSON into Elasticsearch, II. Annotate them using MedCAT service III. Get the JSON from the service, flatten it IV. Ingest it into a separate ES index for search

I. Get file from disk, the hdr_metadata.json is located in the repository folder: /data/ingestion/ , drop it there so NiFi can pick it up. II. Split the JSON list into individual records. III. Grab the fields of the json that we are interested in (document description, title, abstract and id). These will be stored as attributes in the flowfile ( after this process the original json contents of. the flowfile will still be present, right click the a flowfile and check the Attributes tab) IV. Use ReplaceText to replace a flowfile content with the new Json, also escapes chars of each field using NiFi's Expression language. V. Convert the record Avro VI. Ingest the record(s) into ES.
Please check the ES credentials for the client connector controller service. And also the Record reader/writer properties. User the little 'Checkmark' button on the right top side of the processor configuration window (right click configure or double click processor to enter config, and go to properties tab)
